#summary Instructions for loading and running the emulator.
#labels Featured

= Setup & Installation =

Download the latest version from the [http://code.google.com/p/fceugc/downloads/list Downloads page].

== Wii ==

The most popular method of running homebrew on the Wii is through the [http://hbc.hackmii.com/ Homebrew Channel]. If you already have the channel installed, just copy over the apps folder
included in the archive into the root of your SD card.

Remember to also create the fceugx directory structure required (a sample structure is included in the archive).

For more detailed instructions, see [http://www.wiibrew.org/wiki/FCE_Ultra_GX Wiibrew].

== GameCube == 

You can load FCE Ultra GX via sdload and an SD card in slot A, or by streaming 
it to your Gamecube, or by making a bootable DVD. A good source for information is the [http://www.tehskeen.com/forums/ TehSkeen Forums].
